title: In-game lag
body: Since two days ago, I started to get high ping. Normally, I get 40 ms. But, these days, I'm starting to get 60-100 ms and it goes often to 200-300. I use Bell Canada. I've tried everything that's in the Connection Issues Player Support page and I've sent a ticket to Riot (Not replied)

replies.body:
Big changes in latency are generally caused by poor ISP routing to the server. Since you've already reached out to our tech specialists in a ticket, I recommend continuing to be patient while a tech gets back to you. They'll have the tech skills and tools to work with you on a permanent solution.

Let me know if you have any questions.
